title: Girld character lowpoly anime toon
description: character designed in a lowpoly style with an anime toon aesthetic. She features a rounded face with expressive eyes, brown braided hair, and a casual outfit consisting of a striped shirt, red jacket, distressed jeans, red boots, and a cowboy hat.
longDescription:
A female character designed in a lowpoly style with an anime toon aesthetic. This model combines simplicity and visual charm, perfect for mobile games, educational applications, and animation projects.

Appearance:

  • Face: Girld has a rounded face with large, expressive eyes typical of the anime style. Her eyes have a shine that adds liveliness and an adorable touch to the character.
  • Hair: Her hair is brown and styled in a braid that gives her a dynamic and youthful look.
  • Clothing: The character wears a casual and colorful outfit that includes a white and blue striped shirt, a red jacket, distressed jeans, and red boots. Additionally, she wears a cowboy hat that adds a distinctive touch to her appearance.
  • Accessories: Girld does not have additional accessories, highlighting her simplicity and focus on her clothing.

Technical Characteristics:

  • Polygons: The model is optimized to maintain a low polygon count without sacrificing essential details, ensuring smooth performance on devices with limited resources.
  • Textures: Detailed textures with flat colors and simple shading that emphasize her toon style.
  • Animations: Includes a basic set of animations such as walking, running, jumping, and basic interaction gestures.

Uses: This character is ideal for:

  • Platform and adventure games.
  • Educational and learning applications.
  • Animation videos and interactive content.
  • Virtual and augmented reality projects.
technicalDetails:
Features:

Lowpoly aesthetic: Characterized by simplified lowpoly shapes.

Vibrant Color Palette: Features a vibrant color palette that enhances the characters' visual appeal and brings them to life.

Optimized Performance: Optimized for all platforms.

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Animated: Yes

Number of Animations: 3 (original animation)

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): In-place

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: Verts 2,124 - Tris 4,158

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 2 Material and 6 Instances (Character 3 and scenery 3)

Number of Textures: 6 (Character 3 and scenery 3)

Texture Resolutions:

* Character with 1 texture of 128x128 and 2 textures of 256x256 (in pixel art)

* Scenery with 3 textures of 128x128

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


  • Documentation: Documentation 3D CHARACTERS | UNREAL ENGINE
  • This character is from the main pack available at https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/6d4e393aacf04e5a8e28d0c8de39a147"
  • Video: https://youtu.be/nodyXJNBxnU


Important/Additional Notes: Low-polygon anime-style characters with pixel art textures, designed for mobile games. They are configured to work with Unreal mannequin animations using retargeting, with foot IK and collision set up.
